subitem_title: Ventura County Channel Islands Harbor Public Works Plan Notice of Impending Development CIH-NOID-0002-18 (Demolition of the Casa Sirena Hotel and Lobster Trap Restaurant and Construction of a New Hotel and Restaurant)
subitem_blurb: Public hearing and action on Notice of Impending Development (NOID) by the Ventura County Harbor Department for demolition of the non-operational and dilapidated 107,600 sq.ft., 45 ft.-high, 184 room Casa Sirena Hotel and 5,400 sq.ft. Lobster Trap Restaurant and new construction consisting of: 203,011 sq.ft., 55 ft-high, 210 room hotel; 7,071 sq.ft. restaurant; 6,250 sq.ft. public plaza and promenade; 450 sq.ft. boater restroom; expansion of existing marina facilities; and a total of 379 parking spaces at 3605 Peninsula Road, Channel Islands Harbor, Ventura County. (WH-V)

subitem_title: University of California Santa Barbara Notice of Impending Development No. UCS-NOID-003-18 (Solar Photovoltaic Power Purchase Agreement Project Phase 3)
subitem_blurb: Public hearing and action on Notice of Impending Development by the University of California Santa Barbara for the addition of approximately 3,318 photovoltaic (PV), low glare solar panels on the roof tops of six building structures (Arts, Intercollegiate Athletics, Theater and Dance West, Davidson Library, Kerr Hall, and Cheadle Hall) to provide electricity for the campus’ electrical grid. The University also proposes the removal of four landscaping trees, located on Main Campus at the University of California Santa Barbara, Santa Barbara County. (DV-V)

(JP-V)
